name: Steven M. TAKES and Catherine C. Takes, His Wife, Petitioners, v. METROPOLITAN EDISON COMPANY, a Corporation, v. Steven M. TAKES d/b/a El Greco Painting Company, Respondent

parties: Steven M. TAKES and Catherine C. Takes, His Wife, Petitioners, v. METROPOLITAN EDISON COMPANY, a Corporation, v. Steven M. TAKES d/b/a El Greco Painting Company, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 15th day of July, 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, BUT LIMITED to the following:
Whether the Superior Court erred in affirming the trial court finding that Respondent timely objected to the flawed punitive damage charge?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
679 A.2d 225
Steven M. TAKES and Catherine C. Takes, His Wife, Petitioners, v. METROPOLITAN EDISON COMPANY, a Corporation, v. Steven M. TAKES d/b/a El Greco Painting Company, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 15, 1996.
